text: Andhera jan'ye dosa ne'i, khanjera jan'ye dosa ne'i, rogira jan'ye dosa ne'i, ebam tomadera nijedera jan'ye'o dosa ne'i ye, tomara ahara karabe tomadera grhe athaba tomadera pitadera grhe athaba tomadera matadera grhe athaba tomadera bhratadera grhe athaba tomadera bhaginidera grhe athaba tomadera pitrbyadera grhe athaba tomadera phuphudera grhe athaba tomadera mamadera grhe athaba tomadera khaladera grhe athaba se'i grhe, yara cabi ache tomadera hate athaba tomadera bandhudera grhe. Tomara ekatre ahara kara athaba prthakabhabe ahara kara, tate tomadera kona dosa ne'i. Atahpara yakhana tomara grhe prabesa kara, takhana tomadera sbajanadera prati salama balabe. Eta allahara kacha theke kalyanamaya o pabitra doya. Emanibhabe allaha tomadera jan'ye ayatasamuha bisadabhabe barnana karena, yate tomara bujhe na'o.
